meanings.definition: A building for the showing of movies.
meanings.sent1: We went to the cinemas to watch a new movie.
meanings.sent2: The cinemas in our town have comfortable seats.
meanings.sent3: The cinemas were so crowded that we had to sit in the front row.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like the lights in the cinemas.
meanings.sent5: The smell of popcorn filled the cinemas, making it a cozy place to be.

meanings.sent1: She works in the cinemas and loves being part of the movie industry.
meanings.sent2: The cinemas employ many people who work behind the scenes.
meanings.sent3: In the world of cinemas, creativity and hard work go hand in hand.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a bustling cinemas of ideas waiting to be brought to life.
meanings.sent5: The cinemas are like a magical realm where stories come alive on screen.
